input.sentences: my girlfriend is a very beautiful woman .
she can be playful at times .
no matter what she wears she always looks good in it .
she is somewhat unpredictable but i like that about her .
yes | my girlfriend is beautiful and i love her very much .
output.sentences: This beautiful woman is posing for a fashion shoot.
The beautiful woman poses with a mask over her face.
The beautiful woman poses in summer wear in front of a graffitied wall.
Next the camera man suggests they go to the beach.
The beach is windy so the beautiful woman puts on a shawl to shield herself from the breeze as they finish up the photo shoot.
